title: Play better golf. Part I. Fundamentals
brief_description: Championship players, Lloyd Mangrum, Sam Snead, Patty Berg, and Jim Ferrier illustrate, by slow motion, sequences and close-ups, the three fundamentals of good golf - correct grip, aim and swing.
